formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: Morten Kromberg has suggested that we do not need to follow the standard APL behavior when handling the Fnf behavior, and we can instead follow the method that we see in most other compilers. That is, we can just overwrite the existing file rather than signalling an error.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This will require a small change in the Function Specification to handle things, which will require changing the enumeration and subsequently the Black Box Definitions. This will also require some code changes in the CoDfns.dyalog namespace script. Current Usage Specification does not need to be changed, and the main models for Increment 3 can be adjusted to handle this change. Previous increments did not or were not sensitive to this change and do not need to be recertified.
